title: eppaDi un manam appaDiyAguga
sahitya:
eppaDi un manam appaDiyAguga idayap-perumAnE Om paramA


anupallavi

  oppuyarvillAda oruvA iraivA unnaiyallAl ingE ennai arivArillai


caraNam    arputangaL kATTi akaTa vikaTam pEshi ATkaLai vasam sheyyum Atralum 
illEn AyuLellAm unadanbisaiyAkkinEn AnAthayAn enrarivAi narp-padam 
koDuttiDum nAyakanE unnai nambinEn nambinEn embirAnE sharaN
